website_summaries.verdict: An high-end model by a brand that knows ping pong tables. The one to get if you want to play on a competition-grade table.
pros: Sturdy, easy to set up, nearly effortless to move, and versatile
Converts to "playback mode" for solo players
cons: A few reports of missing pieces and flaws in the paint
Top may be prone to scuffing after typical play

customer_reviews.title: JOOLA does not honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The surface of the table began to bubble after about 10 months despite being kept inside where the humidity was kept between 40-50% at all times. When I contacted JOOLA, they told me that they wouldn't honor their one year warranty on the table and that the damage was caused by me. After a lot of back and forth, I settled for their offer of a couple of free paddles to close the claim. I didn't have the time to go on arguing with them any longer. Next time I will choose a different brand. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Accepted delivery today. Excited to setup I opened the box only to find how poorly made this table is. Screws connecting the lower support struts were loose because the particle board holes were stripped out. Another support was also loose because it was being fastened with 3/8 inch screws. The holes were also stripped. Returning and will try to find a table that is engineered to last longer than just unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: Pressboard Crap
customer_reviews.text: I had professional assembly, and the assemblers stripped the screws in the pressboard. Amazon replaced it with a new one. The second one I assembled, which was pretty easy. A few weeks later, a piece that came already assembled snapped off while setting it up. It wasn't roughly handled, or forced. The table is pressboard and not made well. The piece pulled out of the pressboard - 3 of the screws just slipped out, and the other 3 crumbled the pressboard with the weight and fell out when no one was in there. You only get a 30 day return window. I've had it for 60 days, and it has only been used a few times. Don't get this brand.
customer_reviews.author: llott0

customer_reviews.title: Easily broke upon initial use.  Horrible experience!
customer_reviews.text: It was straightforward to install, but the first time opening one half of the table the support leg ripped right off the underside. At this point you realise it's made of horrible quality pressboard and they used a handful of small screws into the pressboard to hold things together. Complete joke, waste if money, and now I have no idea how to return this massive piece of junk. Also, the halves are not actually connected... Two separate pieces which I can only imagine will get bumped and separated easily. Finally, the table bounce is totally dead. I played on it backboard style and balls barely bounce off the surface. I've never been so upset with a purchase in years.
customer_reviews.author: RXM

customer_reviews.title: $400 dolllar rip off
customer_reviews.text: Wow— 3.5 years later, and literally less than a dozen uses (sat in the garage for a long time), ALL caster wheels have collapsed. Even paying $400 dollars for a wooden table on metal stands yields the absolute cheapest product that can be sold. Don’t bother paying for what should be a quality product. That being said, if you leave it be, and don’t need to collapse it, ping pong balls bounce beatifully of this piece of painted wood. Don’t bother asking about the net.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Having Fun After Long Wait
customer_reviews.text: We waited 2.5 weeks for the "used but acceptable" table to arrive only to find one of the center corners cracked. This was not just a cosmetic flaw, it would've affected play. Contacted Amazon right away to get a replacement on 11/8/19 which was finally delivered on 12/4/19, almost a month later. Second table had only cosmetic scratches as described, high quality construction, good design, quick set up, clamps are tight and keep the net taut, wheels allow easy maneuverability. Each half is separate, might be a good feature to have 2 sliding bolts on the bottom to keep them together. Took over 6 weeks to receive table but having fun now. Something to keep us entertained during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: USA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality; well packed; need a few tools to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly, and was packed in a box that had been reinforced with particle board, so no damage to the table or parts. It was easy to assemble but you need some tools: a socket wrench and clamp. There are only 4 pieces to bolt together otherwise the table is ready to go. We were playing in about 45 minutes including unpacking all the parts. Overall, happy with the brand and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Travelcrab

customer_reviews.title: From all the reviews I've read it seems like 75% of the tables are good the other 25% ...
customer_reviews.text: Poorly assembled at the factory, they stripped out a majority of the screws that are screwed into the tables frame that secure everything to the bottom of the table. When you over tighten a screw that is going into particle board you cannot use that spot any longer unless you get a larger diameter screw. Also upon opening it there was a scratch on one of the table tops and two of the corners were damaged. From all the reviews I've read it seems like 75% of the tables are good the other 25% not so good and of course I ended up with a not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cupp

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great product to buy for our office! The installation was pretty easy. We thought it was harder, but it took us approximately 25 minutes. The box was pretty heavy but shouldn’t be a problem if two people are installing it. The storage is convenient as well. The tables can fold, and you can easily roll them around. Overall, it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Solid well built 18mm table - love it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. WELL PACKAGED and came with no dings or dents or scratches. it's really heavy - takes 2 to maneuver it safely for setup. Easy setup - all you need to do is attach the roller legs with a few bolts. I thought it would connect into one piece for storage but it is 2 pieces, each half, on rollers. Easy to slide and wheels have sturdy locks when using it. Ball bounces well on surface. Has a very nice net. Does not come with paddles so we bought these. Which seem very nice after 10 games:
customer_reviews.author: MTB rider

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made it a while
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this table for about a year now.. so time for a review. I love it. We all love it. It brings our family together. It folds up so easily and can move easily on the wheels. It’s still in great shape. You can remove the net and adjust it. It’s a little scratched now but with 4 of us playing frequently for a year now it still looks awesome. Very happy with this purchase. Great quality and great brand. Lots of laughs. Lots of arguing in good fun!! I highly recommend this, the money was right on point. Great product and fits well in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Delivery was prompt and set up went well. Second table delivery was also prompt. The Bad: The first table was received and set up by delivery. The screws were completely stripped and the table would not stay together. Requested a replacement table, that table looked like it had already been returned once and attempted to be fixed. It was received with a few bent legs and again striped screws. I will be requesting a refund and do NOT recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table with Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 15mm table and can say without a doubt that it was the correct purchase. Was very pleased with the quality of the table. Have been playing for sometime now and there are no issues with uneven thickness or simply any imperfections. I read some reviews on shipping damage, and can say that I was impressed with the protective packaging. No scratches, dents, or warped table. Assembly took about 30 to 45 min with simply a knife, ratchet, and adjustable wrench. Would highly recommend for a mid grade recreational table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great table - easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I just got this delivered today and so far very happy. Assembly was straight forward - just need to add the wheel assemblies (eight bolts) and it's done. I am sure it was written somewhere but I was surprised that the table is in two pieces and doesn't connect. You just align the two halves and add the net. Also didn't realize that balls and paddles weren't included but that was an oversight on my behalf. Would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: TKF69

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Table!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy box. 200+ lbs. Hadn’t seen two delivery men in an Amazon van before. Once opened it was a snap to assemble. Less than 10 min. Very well made. Solid top. Easy leveled. Top of the line net and posts. Plays excellent. Folds and stores in seconds. An excellent buy at more than $100 off for less than $300. I’d buy again but I don’t think I’ll have to.
customer_reviews.author: Geo H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fun Addition to our Family Room
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I have been wanting a ping pong table for quite some time now. After going to a local place to play, and paying $20 per hour plus the hour drive, we ordered this table. It is wonderful. Arrived as expected, packed very very securely, assembled in just a few minutes with super clear instructions. FYI, it WILL take two people to set it up once the parts are all assembled. We have been playing almost every day, with the exception of the day he had shoulder surgery. He is in a sling for several more weeks but is able to play one handed, so I do all the serving! Wish we would have purchased this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: V S Tilden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but file down the caster to avoid scratching floors
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together once you manage to wield the shipping box around and assemble it (which is easy enough). But the most important thing is that this is the gift that provides the most fun for the family, playing against each other. Super easy to unfold and fold up (takes less than a minute). UPDATE and WARNING: removed one star; the wheels have been scratching our hardwood floors. The casters have a hard and sharp center lip that easily digs into the surface of flooring. I had to file it down to to fix the problem. I wish I would have realized this earlier, as I would have prevented hundreds of scratch marks on a 3 years old floor.
customer_reviews.author: Safari John

customer_reviews.title: A well built ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: Great ping pong table for the price. Considerable thought and consideration given to the packaging for shipment. All components were carefully packed and protected. Assembly instructions were very well written. Total assembly time 11 minutes. Table is well built, net and brackets are good quality. Switching from 2 player mode to single player practice mode is practically effortless. All wheels lock in place which prevents the table from moving while in play. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ricster1963

customer_reviews.title: Great table for competitive amateurs! Table Came with a Medal!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table, worth the price! Love the independent halves and how little space it takes when folded/nested. Update 2 weeks later! My wife and I are really loving this table! Great way to spend time together and along with friends and neighbors. There have been some serious table tennis going on in our garage since then!!! One of the best purchases I have made for entertainment and shed a few pounds! Possible New Years Eve Tournament coming up!! Love that the table came with a medal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and very easy to assemble - 15 minutes from opening to playing
customer_reviews.text: The delivery provider called me 30 minutes prior to arriving at my home and they brought the table into our house (over the threshold service). The product was packaged very well. The instructions are straightforward and with a ratchet set and wrench, we had the table up and running within 15 minutes. The wheels are very nice and sturdy - reminds me of rollerblade wheels so it is easy to maneuver and assemble. It is also very nice that the table is in 2 pieces - you can actually use either half as a card table so it is very useful. There was also enough particle board from the packaging to make a paddle and ball holder.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Prrofessional looking table w/ minor issue
customer_reviews.text: I had seen alerts in several reviews mentioned checking for damage to the corners. After receiving mine I checked and found a small blister on one of the corners. Examining it carefully I believe that it is a manufacturing defect, not damage that occurred during the shipping process. The blister doesn't effect play to any great extent. Still it would not pass inspection if it were being used for a sanctioned tournament. Beyond this issue everything is good, it's flat and smooth and looks great in my game room.
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: High quality table
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and it is easy enough for the kids to fold to play with the backboard. It is high quality and very well constructed. We are very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Easy assembly, packaged perfectly and excellent delivery by Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: First, packaging was perfect, no rips, tears, dents etc. in the outer box. And the amazon delivery dude was awesome, helped me get it into the house and it's heavy! Upon opening it I inspected everything first - no missing screws or bolts, no stripped screws and the table tops are immaculate. After dragging each side into my basement (not fun), took me about 15 minutes to get the bolts in - not hard, I was just double checking all instructions and then watched the video on youtube. Flipped it over, put on the net, and ready to play! I highly recommend this table - very sturdy as well. Get this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Freidberg

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this ping pong table for my son for Christmas. He lives in a townhouse and I was concerned about portability, size, weight and storing it. The table was to be delivered to his townhouse although he wasn't home when the delivery guys were on there way. They worked with him and delivered it to the front office which is about 1/4 mile from his place. He was able to easily get it home and setup without much trouble at all. He absolutely loves it. Not only is it regulation size, he can fold half of the table in an upright position so he can practice alone as well as fold it in half for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: A Good Quality Table at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful as to how easy this would be to assemble, but it really can be assembled in about 20 minutes (once you get it out of the box). It actually takes more time to unpack everything out of the box as it is heavy. It is a good quality table, the net was easy to install and is sturdy, and looks good in our basement. I was choosing between this and the Stiga Advantage table but went with this one because amazon put it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: rbm

customer_reviews.title: slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table - I bought it as an open like new, but there were some pretty severe scratches on the underside (which does not really bother me), but the top of the table had a little line/crack that was painted over I discovered after I had already assembled it and thrown out the box. The ball takes a weird bounce off of the spot if it hits it just right, which is really irritating for an otherwise great table. I am willing to bet that is why it was sent back, and it looks like it was just patched over (unevenly I might add) which is disappointing for a high end table (I splurged for the extra thick table).
customer_reviews.author: Rory M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandsons and their parents. They had suggested a table costing about $120. This one was about three times as much, and it was worth every cent of it. Grandsons' dad and I put it together in about 15 minutes--it took almost as long to get it down the stairs and unpack it as it did to assemble it. Every part matched up. We paid $20 more to go to a heavier table and I think that will have been a worthwhile investment in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Family purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: Delivery folks brought it in and were good about checking to make sure it was not damaged. Setup took no time... this table is sturdy and looks good. We also can move it around the house and outside if we like. I thought not having the tables connected would be a problem but that helped with mobility. We have enjoyed hours of family time in this table and it hasn't been in the house a week. It is amazing how everyone has taken to playing. This table is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch table!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I went the extra mile and got a good quality ping pong table. It is very easy to switch from backboard practice to partner play. But it's been such a hit that there's rarely time for solo practice. It was extremely well packaged, which meant it was really hard to unload, but damage to the exterior packaging had no impact on the beautiful table due to the layers of protection. Doubles play is even more fun. A whole social scene is evolving around it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it - easy to assemble/use.  Just note - it's split in middle
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest - the box IS big and bulky. But that's because it has an amazing table inside, with plenty of protective packaging so it wasn't damaged in shipping (something i was worried about when reading other reviews). I set it up by myself, but 2 people would probably be safer. It did only take 10 min to set up. VERY straightforward. As i mentioned in the title, by design it is not a single table - the two halves are independent, but are held together by the two clamps that also serve as the net posts. They are very strong and the table doesn't move, drift apart, or anything like that. Bottom line: i'd recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cynic

customer_reviews.title: Very good ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my company employees, I put it in our Epic room ( game room ), they love it. very strong table. putting it together was very easy, I did it all by myself. it might be heavy for some of you so I advice you get another set of hands, I think one side of the table is about 50-60lb which is not heavy for me. I love it and my co-workers love it which makes a happy workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Matata8

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table.  Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I wanted. Very solid. Easy to store away. Looks great. Would definitely buy it again. Easy to assemble. I think it took me about 15 minutes to put it together and tighten everything. I had questions about how heavy it is and got different opinions looking through the review. Here is my experience: I had the delivery guys put it in the garage. I un-boxed it, hoping to carry all the pieces separately inside and upstairs one a time. That worked for all the parts except for the actual table tops. They are very heavy (which is a good thing for quality, IMO). Carrying them is definitely a two-man job.
customer_reviews.author: Neal P Leazer

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of this table, and the table itself, have far exceeded my expectations. It was delivered into my home by XPO, on a Saturday, on time, and with zero damage to the box or its approximately 200 pounds of contents. WOW! The table itself? WOW! Installing the wheels onto the rest of the otherwise pre-assembled table was EASY. Setting it up to play on was even easier. The clamp-style net is so easy to put on and take off and yet stays firmly in place while playing. The playing surface is smoooooth and LEVEL. The corners are protected. This is a very HIGH-QUALITY table, and very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage/Quality play
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid indoor table for competitive office or neighborhood table tennis afficianados. Reasonably simple assembly along with easy storage and manueverability all make for a high recommendation. I've had mine for a few months now and am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CCA

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this table
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the entire process of this order. Delivery (through an Amazon carrier) was excellent. I only recently had the opportunity to set up this table however and it was also better than expected. My son and I easily lifted the two panels out of the box and from there it was 15min at most before we had all the brackets installed and tightened and playing! Quality is excellent and I, at least, didn't experience any damage in shipping. Quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Well-Priced Functional Ping Pong Table
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Set up in 15 minutes as advertised Excellent price Easy to store in halves Cons: Table leg got bent slightly but could be pushed back in to place raising some concerns about durability Neutral: 15 mm means lower bounce which takes getting used to Bottom Line: At the price point it is an excellent starter ping pong table offering good value.
customer_reviews.author: deepinmud

customer_reviews.title: Multi generational fun
customer_reviews.text: We love this table! So far the players have been grandpa, grandma, and grandpa's son and grandsons. I won't state ages but there is a 63 year age difference between the oldest and youngest players. Make sure to measure the space you are going to put it in - it is a big table and can't go flush against the wall because of the net. That isn't necessarily a bad thing but you do need a fair amount of room. It took Grandpa longer than 10 minutes to set it up - when I asked if it set up in 10 minutes he said "Maybe 10 minutes to get it out of the box." We all highly recommend the table.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Forget water and food supplies, this is the must have for surviving a hurricane.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how much fun this would be. With all of the video games and TV nowadays, this is a great alternative for the rainy day. This is perfect if you are stuck inside during a hurricane without power. Assembly was fairly easy but took 30 mins to open it up and put it all together. It was a 200 pound box so you might need a hand lifting the ~90 lb table halves for assembly. The bottom was damaged during shipping but it didn't change how the table played and amazon handled it amazingly. Overall its just plain fun and a great reason to have friends over for some competition.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Table surface comes seriously cracked!!
customer_reviews.text: This is very disappointing as the name and quality of the table should be excellent. The crack on the table surface is like an earthquake crack that must have been done at factory before final packing. The other half is perfect, just this long crack is impossible to accept as customers or even as Joola management! It’s a Christmas gift for my son and now I have to disassemble it and put it back to the boxes which is a very time wasting effort!!! I’d still recommend it because assembling is easy enough and the quality overall seems very good. Price is very attractive too. Just super bad luck for me...
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table
customer_reviews.text: This table is a professional full size that comes with a cheap price, really good deal given how good it is. Easy to assemble, took me 15 min by myself, better if you get a second set of hands. Net is very good. ball bounce is great. Table folds easily and makes it easy to store. straight into position when unfolded and no tilting. Compared to what other few friends have this looks way better. I have kids who from time to time may hit the table with the rackets or with their toys, no scratches at all. I am very happy with this table. You will not go wrong with this table... Joola stand behind this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy box
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy box! My son and I did not realize the table is two halves that never fully attach, and we would have spent 30 minutes hauling it downstairs if we had known! The package is almost 200 lbs, and the packaging itself is pretty heavy duty. Each table half is way lighter so if the delivery guy (like mine) won't bring it past the driveway you can open the box and take it in pieces. That would have been way easier. Super easy to build! Just a handful of screws, use a socket wrench and it will take you 15 minutes tops!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Koellmann

customer_reviews.title: Great table; very heavy package when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Need 2 people to manipulate the package, and dollies etc. Not to be underestimated. Once laid flat in the assembly area, one person can get it assembled. Very good table, and with packaging that is pretty good. I would be comfortable ordering again and having it shipped - I was nervous about it arriving damaged but it is packaged really well.
customer_reviews.author: KBinPC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy installation and setup
customer_reviews.text: This table is high quality. It went together easily by just adding the wheels. I was a little concerned about delivery because I noticed after the drivers left, the box says to inspect in front of the driver. I didn’t, but there were no issues with the table. It was packed very well. Something to note, it is heavy. I had to open the box and carry the different sections (wife assisted) down the yard into the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great ping pong table for a family of four
customer_reviews.text: Great ping pong table for a family of four. Picking the delivery date and time window of 4 hrs, upon ordering was super simple. The driver called when 30 minutes away so that we were ready for the delivery. The table was not as heavy as I expected to be, the packaging was great and there was no damage at all. Took about 30 min to set up and we were ready to go. Been having fun with this for a few weeks now. The only negative was breaking down the packaging to be recycled. The box is very large and rigid, thus it took time to break into smaller pieces for the curbside pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: great product, good calorie burner
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality Joola product. It was very easy to assemble (my teenage sons did it themselves). It is of sturdy construction and plays smoothly. We all take turns and enjoy this product as well. We purchased rackets and balls from Joola as well and have enjoying using those together with the table. You can easily forget yourself while table tennis playing and loose a few hundred calories chasing that ball :-) We are very satisfied with this product, and Amazon's delivery and overall highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aikaterini Varsou

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great value. It is VERY sturdy and the ball bounces true every time. I was concerned that buying the 15mm version would not be sturdy enough, but I could not have been more wrong. The design is great. Folding into two halves makes it easier to keep in my basement with 8 ft ceilings. The net is easy to set up and adjust. One word of caution: it is heavy. You will need two people at least to move it around. You might consider using the single room service rather than leaving it at the front door.
customer_reviews.author: JerrodTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Table is well made but the red bar that stops the table from moving back & forth quickly broke from the board at the bottom. We will have to add new screws & board patches to fix. Don't understand how a table of this cost can be so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Mkr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was piece of cake, I did it by myself but it is better if there are at least two persons. I like the way that we can storage it when the play ends and also the mobility if you want to change the position of the table. High quality of the products. It is a great option to use it during the quarantine period. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Coello

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I am highly satisfied with the JOOLA 15mm table. At first , I was very skeptical especially about their ads stating 10-20 min assembly and I thought it was impossible and would take more than 40 mins or even 2 hrs (that is what happened with another ping pong table I bought a few years ago; their ads said 30 mins and took me two hours). but this one was very simple. Yon don’t even have to watch any youtube videos to assemble, it’s very simple and easy. It took me less than 10 mins to assemble; all by myself. 5 Stars! I will have another table in a few months! yah!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Lee

customer_reviews.title: Have your tool ready and  non-stop fun in less than 30 min!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. First one was donated to school and this one is for personal/family use. Unlike IKEA's funitures there's no tools (wrench set) included so I would strongly recommend to have a wrench set (cheap combination wrench set will do the work) ready before your table arrives. This ie really easy to set up. My 13 years old son could assemble almost by himself. Good quality for the price. Total set up time was less than 30 minutes. As you know rackets and balls are not included but net comes with table.
customer_reviews.author: M, Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing quality is far below expectation
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for the two months and used for it for a total of 10 times. Before today it was all great and it seems worth the money. However, today when I try to unfold it, I see one of the four red foldable brackets (those to make triangle support between leg and table) dropped out of the back of the table. All four screws just dropped by themselves and the plate got detached from the back of the table. I have been used it very gently. Yet, I never thought the quality can be so low. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Xiongyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC TABLE!!!!!! Simple and fast setup! Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was insane fast. Purchased Monday evening and it came early Friday morning. Putting the table together was minimal and fast. Super easy. Just nut and bolt. I used two wrenches 1 adjustable and 1 socket. Took me all of ten minutes to assemble and level. Easy to level with the table leg ends. It's a fast table, I really do enjoy it. For the price this table will give you what you need. Simple secure storage, well built table, and fast assembly allows for quicker playing time! Absolutely recommend this table to anyone! We are hosting a tournament in our house so I will for sure be telling everyone about it! Thank you Joola!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous getting a product this big delivered. The box was slightly beat up but luckily, the table was in great shape. The set-up was crazy easy, just put some wheels onto the bottom of the table. And it folds up and wheels out of the way easily. The table is very sturdy. My 9 year old has to put all his weight on the edge to reach the middle of the table and there have been no issues with anything bending or looking like it will break. I would highly recommend this table to anyone looking for a table.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Great Ping Pong Table! And easy configuration to use for board games, events, etc.!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this table for nearly a year now, and we love it! It's a key part of our entertainment room setup. Easy to setup for ping pong (with a net clips that ensures the table sides match up), easy to fold one or both sides for storage, and you can use one or both for a board game table or for events! We've done all of thatand it has worked well for all of it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Malleys!

customer_reviews.title: Just Like a Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for our community clubhouse. The truck driver and his helper delivered it and carried it in for, which was a huge relief because it's really heavy. My husband assembled it very easily. It actually stays in two pieces and the net is on a clamp on each side that clamp the two table halves together. Both halves fold up easily for either single play or for storage. The wheels move freely or lock and this is very easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This table is easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: This table is easy to assembly, two people can do it in a short time. All the parts were well protected inside their package so no damage in our table. The table is easy to move thanks to the wheels. The finishing is really nice, the net is easy to install too and fix the table very well, is easy to store because it breaks down in 2 pieces. We are going to spend a lot of time playing with this new table. My kids really liked it and they are so ready to start using it. This item worth the money and we are super excited and happy about our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emilio C

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together (pay for delivery to any room)
customer_reviews.text: I’m 63 and my little wife is 57 and we picked up each half after I put the wheels on with NO problem. The empty box probably weighs 30 pounds. Just pay the 19.95 for them to deliver the table to your room of choice and have them lay it down flat. Be careful cutting open the box that you don’t cut into the table. I ordered this table from another company and they wanted 250 to put it together. It takes ten minutes so don’t pay someone to put it together. It really could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - they took all the extra steps to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Let me start with the packaging it came in. Amazing - they took all the extra steps to be sure the table arrived in good condition. Next, the table itself is perfect - surpassed my expectations. I set it up in a garage and the process to level the table was a breeze. The table surface is attractive and of very high quality. Setup was, at most, fifteen minutes. I kind of laughed when I saw the directions, like four steps and done... but it was that easy.... I was playing in 30 minutes after it arrived. I obviously recommend this table. Very nice when you can have high expectations and they are met fully.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesriver

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value, great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, assembles very easily, and it is very easy to fold, unfold, store. Love the clamp on net (just spring loaded, you don't have to screw a clamp shaft). The wheels are very nice quality with breaks. The box was very well made, amazing (quite a task to break down and put in my trash). I was surprised that the 2 halves do not lock together, I might add some little latches to the bottom later. We had one table move a bit, but easy to push it back into place. In short, WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Quality table and Incredibly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Having a great history with other Joola products, I didn't doubt that the table would be quality, but I was unsure about how easy the assembly would be. Being in NYC in an apartment, the plan was for us to use this in the garage, wheeling it behind our apartment and playing in the alley behind. Yes, very Brooklyn :) I was able to assemble it very quickly, shocked at how little we actually had to do. And while it would be easier with two people, I still didn't have much trouble getting it on the wheels and mobile by myself. I'd recommend to anyone that loves pingpong and might need a mobile/foldable full-size table option for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Table Tennis table, easy to store and set up
customer_reviews.text: The table worked great, the assembling was about the same difficulty level as IKEA products. I like how it can fold so you can easily store it without it taking so much space. My only gripe about the table is that the two table heights don't match up perfectly - until I grip them together with the net holder in the middle. It's slightly off, and if there wasn't something to even the tables out that would be quite detrimental to game play. I'm just a casual Table Tennis player, so I can't speak about how well the table actually is compared to more professional ones, but it works as needed and I enjoyed my purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: Nghia

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Joola ping pong table 15mm thick delivered yesterday. The delivery process was good. They delivered straight to my walk out basement as instructed. The package seemed to be intact. Assembly was easy, however the instruction booklet was not helpful. The youtube video was helpful. Cons- I noticed was a minor scratch on the edge (See attached picture.) Need to see how they would help be fix it. Will update once i get a resolution.Overall I am pleased with the quality and build of the product.
customer_reviews.author: jolly

customer_reviews.title: big scratch on table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 2-3 times I think? Always has a scratch that will effect gameplay.. I guess shipping this large item is just that tough.
customer_reviews.author: Haze

customer_reviews.title: Great table, sharp, and well designed
customer_reviews.text: This table is great and completely as advertised. Plays great, looks great. The net is easy to get a nice tight top, and the net clamps are an easy and good design. Locking the table up and down is easier than I expected. Assembly was quick. All you need is a socket set or a couple of adjustable wrenches. One person can do it, but it's a bit easier with two. One key is to keep a hand squeezing the two brackets together while you get the bolts hand tight. That part is a little awkward, but mostly straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: H. Frank Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great table. We have had some over the years ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great table. We have had some over the years but nothing compares to this. Set up was about 15 min from the box to playing. Solid construction and the wheels make it so simple to move and store away. My kids are loving it. We have removed the dining room table now have ping pong tournaments in the dining room! Needless to say we love to play ping pong.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel meredith

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Our family bought this table for the youth at church over a year ago. The kids and even adults love it. It is a fun way to bring all ages together having fun. So we bought the same table for our game room. Our son and daughter play a lot together which was almost impossible before. It is nice that it can be set up for single play. It was easy to put together and it is easy to fold up and roll to a corner. So it makes area versitile. I would recommend this table to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie  Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied with the price
customer_reviews.text: While it definitely takes 2 people to set up (product is delivered in one box weighing around 190lbs), it only takes one person to move each of the two pieces around. I was initially skeptical about getting a "split" table but each side can be adjusted to level the table and the clamp tent makes the final adjustment. Quite satisfied with the price, delivery and setup process. Only played it for a short time after setting it up today but bounce and feel is just like a regular table.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: After looking around and researching every table out there within my price range, I decided on this Joola Inside Table Tennis Table, and I am so happy I did! First of all, assembly was really simple! It comes almost completely assembled, all you have to do is assemble the wheel brackets. It is very well made, and feels/looks really solid. It's a 2-piece table that stores so easy. The two halves line up perfectly. Very easy to roll and fold up for storage. This table is great for the average recreational player. I love playing with my kids. Great price but doesn't look cheap at all. Great quality table! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great table; great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great table; great fun; even appeals to the hard-to-please teens! Two caveats: assembly required the proper tools to handle tightening the provided nuts and bolts, but if you have those, you are set! Also note, if it's going to be anywhere other than the ground floor, it will take two strong people to lift and move to destination, and you'll need to check your staircase dimensions to assure clearance. Storage is a breeze; very compact when fully collapsed; also love the solo play feature with half the table in storage position.
customer_reviews.author: NYer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun with your teenager!
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived as scheduled. It is in two pieces inside the box, so we removed from the box to take down to the basement one half at a time-totally manageable with myself and my husband. The assembly of the wheels was easy and took less than half hour. The table folds easily to put away to the side of the room when not in use-completely transformed the kids' playroom into a teen hangout. We played for hours and enjoyed. High quality table, good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Joola!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for many different Tennis Tables and came across Joola. I have been seeing Joola brand in my office and clubs, when it came to purchase one I trust the quality and performance of this table. One of my friend & neighbor bought few months before me and my son (9 yrs) started playing with friend's son and picked it very well. I simply went ahead and bought Joola for gameroom and I am very happy with my Joola. We play Table Tennis very often, even when we have 15 min before dinner or bedtime. Its our Family tournament game now. If you are looking for good quality Tennis Table I simple recommend Joola.
customer_reviews.author: hittu123

customer_reviews.title: Owner is undefeated
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. I had never even seen a table this nice much less played on one in my 40+ years. I fold it up and set it up at least once a week as this is in my workout area. Very easy. Comes with a nice net...again the nicest one I had ever played on before. And the best part, no one has beat me yet in my own home. I am the ping pong King.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: All set, all good and lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I am having a lot of fun with my son... super easy to fold, super easy to assemble but need to persons and overall looks good quality. The package is pretty heavy, I would recomment you to take option for delivery in the room where you want if you have to move it like in the basement unless you have enough muscle. I had a minor issue and this was fixed by great support of amazon. So, I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Nadir22

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. I was able to put the table together by myself in about 15 minutes. I like that the table is two separate pieces that don't get secured together by screws or bolts. It makes It easy to setup for practicing by your self, or just moving out of the way. I have only had the table for a few days so I can't speak to the durability. The table looks and works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rickard

customer_reviews.title: A+ Table, very easy to put together, use, and store!
customer_reviews.text: My first ping pong table and I will definitely recommend this to anyone. Takes about 15 minutes to put together, it is incredibly easy to fold up, and even easier to store away as it comes apart into two halves. A+ table! edit. they advertise free balls for doing some steps, I did. never received them. hell.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in delivery of a nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product but when it was delivered there were screws missing, loose, and many not able to tighten and will have to be replaced because they are too small for the holes. I am assuming that that is because of the screws working themselves loose in delivery because they are going into particle board and as they were jostled in shipping they reamed the holes larger. This could have easily been a 4 or 5 star if it had arrived in better assembly shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table
customer_reviews.text: This thing was super easy to assemble. It took maybe 15 minutes to put it together. Way easier then any other ping pong table I’ve ever assembled. It’s very well built and sturdy. Good quality product. If I ever have to buy another one it will be this one for sure
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: Has throughtful features, including easy to remove net. Foldability of table is super easy. I wish the corners had a little more robust corner guards on them (they do have some plastic protection, however). Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the Right Stuff ping pong table !!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow Wow Wow!!! A nice looking table ~ pretty blue color ~ AND it went together beautifully! ONE page of good instructions. Thats all. One! My daughter & I assembled the legs in less than 30 min. All holes lined up. All screws, washers & nuts worked with each other. The net went on easily. No angst. It simply all WORKED! Amazing in this day & age. It folds in half for storage. Slick. Its stable yet rolls when you want it to. Thank you so very much for this excellent product. We are going to have LOTS of fun playing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.text: So, Here is a mixed emotion 4 star. Would have given Joola 2 stars. Because my box was missing nuts and bolts. AND there is no frigging customer service number for them. Only email. They MAY respond within a week, but maybe within a month. Amazon came to the rescue. The best customer service folks made it right. I bought needed bolts at local store, and am happy with the table. So, all in all, if you want a cheap/decent table, this is fine. But if you will put many years of use, want decent customer service, more reliability, I would say put in more money and get little better table.
customer_reviews.author: SlyDoggyDogg68

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together... hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would take a longer time to put together, but it was about 20-30 minutes, and quite easy. We have used this quite a bit, and it is a very durable table. All in all, we are very pleased with this table and would highly recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great table, just issue with instructions.
customer_reviews.text: After about two weeks, table is great. Build quality seems more than enough for indoor use. Assembly: Written instructions that came with the table are poor. All the assembly that is really needed is attaching wheel brackets, but instructions use confusing terms and not enough language to explain that clearly. The instructions pasted on the table are better, or use the video online. Also, the net came already to use, but the instructions given don't assume that so be careful not to take apart the net that ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for Christmas and set it up. Easy set-up with a socket wrench and an open end wrench - took about 15 minutes to have a working table (shipped mostly assembled). Glad I paid a little extra to have it delivered into the space where I am using it - it's pretty heavy. Two young delivery men were finding it a little challenging to carry. Solid construction (hence the weight), with quality components. Easy to fold up and move for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great table with easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I found setup to be very easy, especially compared to some of the reviews for other tables that I've read about. The table surface has a nice consistent bounce and feel. It's great to finally have an ideal playing surface to use for a change as most of the bars and rec centers I used to go to in order to scratch my table tennis itch always seem to be chipped, warped, unlevel, have crappy nets, etc. I've already gotten a lot of use out if it and plan to continue to do so for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D'Amico

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, super stable, super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Had the table out of the box and up in less than 20 minutes. I was afraid the 15mm version would be too flimsy or light weight but its more than enough. No need to buy the thicker table unless you plan to have a dance party on top of it but the ball pockets/holders on the nicer table would have been pretty useful. Very nice table. Converts easily to solo mode and will fold up and roll-away in seconds. Product was packed nicely and well protected so it was in perfect condition when we received it. I had Amazon deliver inside and upstairs and glad I did as the box was quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevinator

customer_reviews.title: Durable table
customer_reviews.text: Our kids absolutely adore this table! Plus, it's super durable (which is great since all 24 of them want to play all of the time). Easy to put together, but definitely required two people to lift the box before it was assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality table and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this in time for my family to come in to town. What was important to me was getting a high quality table that would set up quickly. I was put off by all the other tables I looked at because they were comparable in price to this one but they all seemed to have a 2+ hour set up time with multiple people involved. This table said it could be set up in minutes. I was skeptical. But it was true. If you count time to unbox, I went from delivery to playing in about 20 minutes. And I'm happy with the quality of the table so far. It has held up well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lev

customer_reviews.title: All eight screws are useless, can sustain no force
customer_reviews.text: Brand new shipment arrived. unpackaged. eracted one panel with no issues. did the other half, both metal support fell off from the board. All eight screws are useless, can sustain no force. very disappointed. It doesn't seem to affect function of the table being used for ping pong but it is obviously built very flimpsy. Thought about returning the package but they're so heavy. buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: bounce
customer_reviews.text: this is a great competition ready table that can be greatly enjoyed on a recreational level too. It has a great bounce and tight net. I have enjoyed playing on it for the last month.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Chalaby

customer_reviews.title: Very amazing experience of Joola Inside Table Tennis Table
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy and convenient to assemble the table. My two teenage boys could do this on their own. It is very stable in our family room. With wheels, it could be moved around and put away easily. On the first day it was shipped, we played table tennis to experience how it worked. We, table tennis lovers, felt satisfied and felt like professionals. Highly recommend this Joola table tennis table. You could have tons of fun with your family playing table tennis at home and can practice by yourself when half of the table erected.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Ju Huey

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction - stands up to lots of use!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table for our company break room. I can hear whoops of victory and anguished cries of defeat from my office as our shop employees get into it..... I love it! Table is holding up well under some pretty intense use...... it was easy to assemble, and sure beats some of the cheap Craigslist Ping Pong Tables I've seen before. Well worth what we paid for it. It has had much more than $400 of 'corporate value' for us!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table. Very high quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. Very high quality for the price. It is in two separate halves so it stores easily. The hardware seems sturdy and well-made. The casters are heavy-duty and well-designed. If you are worried about having room for this table, consider that it stores very flat up against the wall. Additionally if you have family gatherings where you need to seat people for dinner, you can easily use the table for dining since it is the correct height. Obviously you would want to protect it by covering it with a cloth. The teenagers enjoy it but it's also something that parents and kids can enjoy together. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunlaney

customer_reviews.title: Get this table!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first major ping pong table purchase and I couldn't have been happier. The table was shipped in a super well protected box (though super heavy too). We had them deliver it to our garage and carried the pieces down to our basement. It was a 2 person job for sure. We ordered the 18mm thicker top and are very pleased with the play on it. The net is also of good quality and the clamps are strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ping pong table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ping pong table! Much better quality than I thought it would be but it is 200 pounds when delivered so prepare for that. I just opened the box outside and individually brought each piece upstairs to my 5th floor condo. It's legs are "powdered coated steel" so its heavy but very sturdy and will last a lifetime. There are Youtube videos that show you how to assemble the table and it took around 15 minutes. Super easy to put together and its great that it's in 2 pieces for storage in my condo. I'm not a pro table tennis player but I've played most of my life off and on and know quality when i see it
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Ping Pong Table
customer_reviews.text: Table was very easy to assemble, very sturdy. It's heavy though, need 2 people. Two sides are separate so easy to store. There's a clip that holds the top in place when stored. When you want to play, just inclip, lower and push 2 sides together. Net is also easy to attach, it just clips right onto the table. The finish is a nice blue, not real bright. We had a 20 year old table before this so this one is super nice. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy table! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Church Youth Room to replace a cheaper version of ping pong table. I was very pleased with the sturdiness of this ping pong table and the way that it is constructed. Assembly was very simple -- 8 bolts and it was ready to be used. The table folds easily in half and wheels easily. This folding is also handy for storage. Great table! Sturdy enough to handle the play of teenagers and competitive youth leaders!
customer_reviews.author: JulKel

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged during the shipping
customer_reviews.text: There were some damages (probably during shipping). Some support legs were bent; screws fell off. The surface is bent. However, we didn't want to wait for another several weeks. I was able to fix some of the issues and start to use it. With $400, I did not expect it will be superior quality. But it still surprised a little bit with the this cheap build. Hopefully it can last a year or so until kids gets tired of it. Pros: Installation is very easy. Two pieces are separate and it is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome budget ping pong table. It took less than 20 minutes to put it together by myself. I would suggest having another person help you out with the two main pieces and getting them on the floor and upright from that position, but it can be done by yourself. I got this on a gold box deal and I was very happy with the price. One thing I noticed is the table is very solid and the casters were surprisingly high quality. This table does not feel cheap at all. I look forward to years of enjoying this table as my family grows!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The table is ok, but the customer service of Joola is horrible. They never answer phone calls, they never call you back when you leave a voice message. The email address they provided for contacting the customer service is unmonitored. And the "contact us" page in their website launches the payment page, so basically there is no way you can contact the seller if you have any concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: We got this table for Christmas and have loved playing it since. The assembly was pretty simple. It took maybe 10 minutes to put it together. Most of the pieces were already installed. It's easy to fold up when we're not playing and want more room. Play is good. The table feel solid and high quality. I'm sure you could get a thicker table, but this one plays just fine for us amateurs and feels nice and solid. No real complaints to speak of at this point. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

product_meta.title: JOOLA Inside - Professional MDF Indoor Table Tennis Table with Quick Clamp Ping Pong Net and Post Set - 10 Minute Easy Assembly - USATT Approved - Ping Pong Table with Single Player Playback Mode
feature_bullets: JOOLA - AN OLYMPIC TABLE TENNIS BRAND TRUSTED FOR 60+ YEARS: Launched in the 1950s, JOOLA has been the proud sponsor of the biggest tournaments in the world, Including the Olympics, World Championships, and US Open. Equipment designed for all levels.

15mm MDF SURFACE TOURNAMENT QUALITY AT HOME: The JOOLA Inside Table Tennis Table is a competition grade, regulation size indoor ping pong table, perfect for playing in your home, office, or recreation center-USATT Approved for exceptional playability.

EASY AND QUICK ASSEMBLY: Set up this top-performing table tennis table in approximately 10 minutes out of the box. The tournament-grade regulation size 72" ping pong net set has a convenient clamp system for quickly attaching and removing from the table.

SAFE, MOBILE, COMPACT STORAGE: The 2 halves and 3" lockable wheels and casters makes this ping pong table easy to roll and move around when not in use. Can be used as an outdoor ping pong table on a clear, sunny day. Does not include ping pong paddles.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: JOOLA listens and learns from your feedback to create top of the line quality table tennis equipment for kids & adults. If you're not 100% satisfied or have product suggestions our customer service team is available to help.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
